title: Climate Change: Heat-induced heart attack risk on the rise

title_detail.value: Climate Change: Heat-induced heart attack risk on the rise

summary: Heart attack, or myocardial infarction, is the number one cause of death worldwide. A new study shows that the risk of suffering a heat-induced heart attack has increased significantly in recent years. During the same period of time, no comparable changes in cold weather heart attack risks have been recorded.
